metadata.description:

[h1]ENG[/h1]
[h1]Everlasting Summer: The Binding of Isaac Mod![/h1]
[i][b]Mod created based on the game [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/331470/Everlasting_Summer/]Everlasting Summer[/url][/b][/i]
[h2]This mod adds:[/h2] [list] [*] 9 Characters [*] 20+ Items [*] Music and Sound Effects [*] 4 Cards [*] Transformations [*] Custom Loading Screens [*] External Item Descriptions Compatibility [/list]
[h2]Starting Items[/h2]
[table] [tr] [th]Name[/th] [th]Items[/th] [/tr] [tr] [td][b]Alisa[/b][/td] [td]Electric Guitar Everlasting Vodka [i]+1 Card[/i][/td] [/tr] [tr] [td][b]Lena[/b][/td] [td]Gone With The Wind Knife [i]+1 Card[/i][/td] [/tr] [tr] [td][b]Ulyana[/b][/td] [td]Stolen Candy [i]+1 Card[/i][/td] [/tr] [tr] [td][b]Semyon[/b][/td] [td]410 Bus[/td] [/tr] [tr] [td][b]Miku[/b][/td] [td]Classic Guitar Sintezator [/td] [/tr] [tr] [td][b]Elektronik[/b][/td] [td]Robot Head [i](Upgrade System)[/i][/td] [/tr] [tr] [td][b]Slavya[/b][/td] [td]Dinning Room Key[/td] [/tr] [tr] [td][b]Shurik[/b][/td] [td]Fittings Psycho Mode [/td] [/tr] [tr] [td][b]Yulya[/b][/td] [td]Sugar [i]+1 Card[/i][/td] [/tr] [/table]
[h2]Items[/h2] [list] [*] [b]Electric Guitar[/b] = + 1.5 Damage [*] [b]Alisa Bomb[/b] = Gives 10 Bombs [*] [b]Everlasting Vodka[/b] = Adds Confusion to enemies for 5 seconds [*] [b]Robot Head[/b] = [u]LVL1[/u] - Shoots 4 lasers. [u]LVL2(Chip)[/u] - Shoots 8 lasers. [u]LVL3(Upgraded Chip)[/u] - Shoots 16 lasers [*] [b]Chip[/b] = + 0.10 to TearFallingSpeed. Upgrade Robot Head to LVL2 [*] [b]Upgraded Chip[/b] = + 1 to Luck. Upgrade Robot Head to LVL3 [*] [b]Knife[/b] = + 2.5 Damage [*] [b]Dining Room Key[/b] = Add 99 keys [*] [b]Glass Shard[/b] = + 0.75 Damage [*] [b]Stolen Candy[/b] = Gives 1 Soul Heart [*] [b]Sugar[/b] = Gives 1 Golden Heart every use [*] [b]Gone With he Wind[/b] = Gives 1 coin every use. 20% chance to get 1 key [*] [b]Classic Guitar[/b] = + 0.25 to Shotspeed [*] [b]Sintezator[/b] = + 5 to Luck [*] [b]Shuttlecock[/b] = Gives 2 Soul Hearts [*] [b]Flare Gun[/b] = + 0.25 to Movespeed. Lighting Tears [*] [b]Psycho Mode[/b] = Adds Explosive Tearflags. Removed after use [*] [b]Alisa's Mangekyou Sharingan[/b] = Adds Amaterasu Flame to enemies for 5 seconds [*] [b]Lena Rinnegan[/b] = Spawn Portal of Friends [*] [b]410 Bus[/b] = Drops Bus to random enemy [*] [b]Genda[/b] = Drops Genda to random enemy [*] [b]Little Alisa[/b] = Spawn Little Alisa. Damage random enemy [*] [b]Little Lena[/b] = Spawn Little Lena. Damage random enemy [*] [b]Fittings[/b] = Character will give additional damage in melee every 4 tears [/list]
[h2]Cards[/h2] [list] [*] [b]Alisa Card[/b] = Adds Freeze everyone in the room [*] [b]Lena Card[/b] = Adds MidasFreeze everyone in the room [*] [b]Ulyana Card[/b] = Spawn 4 Red Hearts [*] [b]Yulya Card[/b] = Spawn 10 Flies [/list]
[h2]Transformations[/h2]
[table] [tr] [th]Name[/th] [th]Items[/th] [th]Effects[/th] [/tr] [tr] [td][b]Miku[/b] [/td] [td]Sintezator Classic Guitar Electric Guitar[/td] [td]Changes Tears to [u]Light From Heaven[/u] Adds New Costume Gives 3 Golden Hearts [/td] [/tr] [tr] [td][b]Lena[/b] [/td] [td]Gone With The Wind Knife Glass Shard Shuttlecock[/td] [td]Changes Tears to [u]Wiggle Tears[/u] Adds New Costume Gives 5 Keys Spawn 10 Flies[/td] [/tr] [tr] [td][b]Semyon[/b] [/td] [td]410 Bus Knife Flare Gun[/td] [td]Changes Tears to [u]Split Tears[/u] Adds New Costume Gives 20 Coins Gives 2 Black Hearts[/td] [/tr] [tr] [td][b]Alisa[/b] [/td] [td]Classic Guitar Sintezator Everlasting Vodka Electric Guitar[/td] [td]Changes Tears to [u]Pulse Tears[/u] Adds New Costume Gives 25 Bombs[/td] [/tr]
